sentences.en: Do you just slather on some extra deodorantas you head out door?
sentences.cn: 他们是否要在出门前涂抹大量除臭剂 呢 ?

sentences.en: If your skin is dry, you have to slather on moisturizer to soften it.
sentences.cn: 如果你的皮肤干燥，就得多涂些润肤霜让它滋润。

sentences.en: Joey : She said she wants to slather my body with stuff and then lick it off.
sentences.cn: 她说她想要在我身体上涂满东西,然后全部舔干净.

sentences.en: She said she wants to slather my body with stuff and then lick it off.
sentences.cn: JOEY:她跟我说她想在我身上涂上一层什么,然后再用舌头舔掉.

sentences.en: you've got an open slather here, lad — do what you like.
sentences.cn: 你可以自由行动，小伙子——做你想做的事。

phrases.tran_cn: (澳/新西兰，非正式)自由行动；自由支配

trans.tran_cn: 大量的用, 厚厚地涂
trans.tran_en: to cover something with a thick layer of a soft substance
